mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM ss_com_task a INNER JOIN sal_company b ON a.company_id = b.company_id WHERE a.is_active = 1 AND b.is_active = 1 AND a.task_category IN (1,2) AND a.company_id = #{companyId}
mapper.sql: a.customer_id, a.com_account_id, a.com_account_name, a.company_id, b.title AS 'company_ame', a.ss_account, a.bank_account, a.settlement_area, a.payment_bank, a.payment_way, a.bill_receiver, a.expire_date_front AS 'expire_date', a.legal_person, a.contact_address, '' AS 'query_account', a.industry_category, '' AS 'com_ratio', a.dispatch_material, a.submit_remark AS 'remark', a.task_status
mapper.select:
SELECT sct.company_id, sct.com_task_id, sct.task_category, sct.customer_id, sct.expire_date, sct.submitter_id, sct.submitter_name, sct.submit_time, sct.submit_remark, sct.task_status, cc.title, scm.* FROM ss_com_task sct LEFT JOIN (SELECT company_id, title FROM sal_company WHERE is_active = 1)cc ON sct.company_id = cc.company_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT com_material_id, com_task_id AS com_task_id_m, material_type, material_name, submit_time AS submit_time_m, receive_time, remark, `status` FROM ss_com_material WHERE is_active = 1 ) scm ON sct.com_task_id = scm.com_task_id_m WHERE sct.is_active =1 AND sct.com_task_id = #{comTaskId}
AND sct.task_status != 3
AND sct.task_status = 3
AND sct.task_status = 4

SELECT sct.company_id, sct.com_task_id, sct.task_category, sct.customer_id, sct.expire_date, sct.submitter_id, sct.submitter_name, sct.submit_time, sct.submit_remark, sct.task_status, sct.task_form_content, sct.start_handle_date, sct.send_check_date, sct.finish_date, sct.handle_remark, sct.rejection_remark, sct.dynamic_extend, sc.title, scm.*, sca.* FROM ss_com_task sct LEFT JOIN ss_account_com_relation scr ON sct.company_id = scr.company_id AND scr.is_active=1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT com_account_id AS com_account_id_acc, supplier_id, ss_account_type, ss_account, bank_account, com_account_name, settlement_area, payment_bank, payment_way, bill_receiver, expire_date AS expire_date_acc, ss_username, ss_pwd, initial_balance, initial_debt, origin_place, origin_place_remark, query_account, deliver_way, deliver_way_remark, provide_certificate_time, change_time, receive_date, into_date, end_date, dispatch_material, remark AS remark_acc, state FROM ss_com_account WHERE is_active=1 )sca ON scr.com_account_id = sca.com_account_id_acc LEFT JOIN ( SELECT com_material_id, com_task_id AS com_task_id_m, material_type, material_name, submit_time AS submit_time_m, receive_time, remark, `status` FROM ss_com_material WHERE is_active = 1 )scm ON sct.com_task_id = scm.com_task_id_m LEFT JOIN ( SELECT company_id, title FROM sal_company WHERE is_active = 1 )sc ON sct.company_id = sc.company_id WHERE sct.is_active =1 AND sct.com_task_id = #{comTaskId}
AND sct.task_status != 3
AND sct.task_status = 3
AND sct.task_status = 4

SELECT sct.company_id, sct.com_account_id, sct.com_task_id, sct.task_category, sct.customer_id, sct.expire_date, sct.submitter_id, sct.submit_time, sct.submit_remark, sct.task_status, sct.task_form_content, sct.start_handle_date, sct.send_check_date, sct.finish_date, sct.handle_remark, sct.rejection_remark, sct.leader_ship_name, sc.title, sca.com_account_id AS com_account_id_acc, sca.supplier_id, sca.ss_account_type, sca.ss_account, sca.bank_account, sca.com_account_name, sca.settlement_area, sca.payment_bank, sca.payment_way, sca.bill_receiver, sca.expire_date AS expire_date_acc, sca.ss_username, sca.ss_pwd, sca.initial_balance, sca.initial_debt, sca.origin_place, sca.origin_place_remark, sca.query_account, sca.deliver_way, sca.deliver_way_remark, sca.provide_certificate_time, sca.change_time, sca.receive_date, sca.into_date, sca.end_date, sca.dispatch_material, sca.state, sca.remark AS remark_acc, sar.ss_account_ratio_id, sar.com_account_id AS com_account_id_sar, sar.industry_category, sar.com_ratio, sar.start_month, sar.end_month FROM ss_com_task sct LEFT JOIN sal_company sc ON sct.company_id = sc.company_id AND sc.is_active = 1 LEFT JOIN ss_com_account sca ON sca.com_account_id = sct.com_account_id and sca.is_active = 1 LEFT JOIN ss_account_ratio sar ON sca.com_account_id = sar.com_account_id WHERE sct.is_active = 1 AND sct.com_task_id = #{comTaskId}
AND sct.task_status != 3
AND sct.task_status = 3
AND sct.task_status = 4
mapper.update:
UPDATE ss_com_task sct SET
sct.start_handle_date=NULL,
sct.send_check_date=NULL,
sct.modified_by =#{modifiedBy},
sct.modified_time=#{modifiedTime},
sct.task_status = #{taskStatus}-1
WHERE sct.com_task_id = #{comTaskId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ss_com_task sct where sct.is_active = 1 AND sct.company_id = #{companyId} AND sct.task_category in(1,2) AND sct.task_status in (0,1,2,3)
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ss_com_task sct where sct.is_active = 1 AND sct.company_id = #{companyId} AND sct.task_category=#{taskCategory} AND sct.task_status =3
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ss_com_task ( customer_id, com_account_id, company_id, task_category, expire_date, submitter_id, submitter_name, submitter_dept_id, submitter_dept_name, submit_time, submit_remark, task_form_content, chat_history, dynamic_extend, task_status, handle_user_id, handle_user_name, start_handle_date, send_check_date, finish_date, handle_remark, rejection_remark, business_interface_id, task_id, ss_account, bank_account, com_account_name, payment_bank, payment_way, bill_receiver, industry_category, expire_date_front, settlement_area, legal_person, contact_address, dispatch_material, is_active, created_time, modified_time, created_by, created_display_name, modified_by, modified_display_name, leader_ship_id, leader_ship_name ) VALUES ( #{customerId}, #{comAccountId}, #{companyId}, #{taskCategory}, #{expireDate}, #{submitterId}, #{submitterName}, #{submitterDeptId}, #{submitterDeptName}, #{submitTime}, #{submitRemark}, #{taskFormContent}, #{chatHistory}, #{dynamicExtend}, #{taskStatus}, #{handleUserId}, #{handleUserName}, #{startHandleDate}, #{sendCheckDate}, #{finishDate}, #{handleRemark}, #{rejectionRemark}, #{businessInterfaceId}, #{taskId}, #{ssAccount}, #{bankAccount}, #{comAccountName}, #{paymentBank}, #{paymentWay}, #{billReceiver}, #{industryCategory}, #{expireDateFront}, #{settlementArea}, #{legalPerson}, #{contactAddress}, #{dispatchMaterial}, #{isActive}, #{createdTime}, #{modifiedTime}, #{createdBy}, #{createdDisplayName}, #{modifiedBy}, #{modifiedDisplayName}, #{leaderShipId}, #{leaderShipName} )
